S

sendList(UUID) - Method in class stream.tcp.EchoServerMultiThreaded
Method to send a list of connected clients to a specific client
sendPrivateMsg(String, String, String) - Method in class stream.tcp.EchoServerMultiThreaded
The method takes a message (or information in general) passed as a String, and sends it to a specific client if connected.
sendToAll(String) - Method in class stream.tcp.EchoServerMultiThreaded
The method takes a message (or information in general) passed as a String, saves it the chat history and sends it to all connected clients.
sendToAllExcept(String, UUID) - Method in class stream.tcp.EchoServerMultiThreaded
The method takes a message (or information in general) passed as a String, saves it the chat history and sends it to all connected clients except a specific client given by his uuid.

Method used to send a message (or information) to the server.
